name: Rumble Stumble Tumble
description:
Note: The Fullscreen Hotkey doesn't seem to work on browser versions, works fine on the executables.

I might make a more content rich JUICED UP version after this. Maybe. Let me know if you think I should. C:

Made for the Precision game jam.

Run! Slide! Jump! Swing! Avoid the bats! Avoid the traps! Hit the switches! All in a days work.

Outrun the boulder and get out alive as you play as an explorer finding treasure in a cave somewhere.

High skill based gameplay, simple to pick up, hard to master!

You might get something special at the end if you make a perfect run without hitting anything on the way there, or maybe not, who knows?
